[![](https://i2.wp.com/photos4.flickr.com/7918334_1293189140.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/7918334/ "photo sharing") **[Rock Texture 2](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/7918334/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).**
I’ve finally finished going through the wedding photos I shot for some friends and my time is my own again. In the meantime, here’s a rock texture I rather liked. It was shot during a walking holiday in Devon over Easter. More [here](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/sets/197657/).
